data.title: main@groups.jewishgen.org
data.meta_description: *Welcome!* The JewishGen Discussion Group unites Jewish genealogical researchers worldwide as they share information, ideas, methods, tips, techniques, and resources.
data.text:
Group Information

www.jewishgen.org

16,907 Members

600,571 Topics , Last Post:

Started on

RSS Feed

Group Email Addresses

Post: main@groups.jewishgen.org

Subscribe: main+subscribe@groups.jewishgen.org

Unsubscribe: main+unsubscribe@groups.jewishgen.org

Group Owner: main+owner@groups.jewishgen.org

Help: main+help@groups.jewishgen.org

Group Settings

Group Guidelines

All members can post to the group.

Posts to this group require approval from the moderators.

Posts from new users require approval from the moderators.

Messages are set to reply to group.

Subscriptions to this group require approval from the moderators.

Archive is visible to anyone.

Wiki is visible to anyone.

Only moderators can create hashtags.

Members cannot edit their messages.

Members can set their subscriptions to no email.
